_header: Tell we now of that year
Note: For other texts, some with Prologues, see 114, 6829. For pictorial prognostications, see Woodborough roll, BL facs. 480 A, B; also Oxford, Bodleian Library Rawlinson D.939 (SC 15409).
_description: Erra Pater, prognostications according to the day on which New Year falls — 155 lines in couplets.

CamStJohn135.First Lines:
Tell we nowe of þat ȝerethat be gynnyth with
                    Ienyvere…
CamStJohn135.Last Lines:
…but kepe þi wete ffastþu schall haue nede at
                    þe last
CamStJohn135.Note: Added to front flyleaf by a hand of s. xv
CamStJohn135.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “English Almanacks of the XVth Century.” 
             Philological Quarterly
         18 (1939): 321-31: 324-8.
